articles.summary: The government of El Salvador has begun growing its gold reserves after a lengthy Bitcoin accumulation spree. President Nayib Bukele confirmed the increase in gold reserves in a post on X. The Central Reserve Bank says the increase is due to the increase of the gold prices.

articles.title: El Salvador celebrates Bitcoin anniversary amid mixed results 4 years on
articles.author: Bit RSS
articles.summary: El Salvador was the first country to make Bitcoin legal tender, but it has since scaled back its Bitcoin laws and public sector involvement in the Bitcoin economy. It has also relaxed its laws on Bitcoin.    for the time being, Bitcoin is no longer legal tender in El Salvador.

articles.title: Tether Shoots Down Bitcoin Sell-Off Rumors, Doubles Down on BTC, Gold, and Land
articles.author: Brave New Coin
articles.summary: Ardoino denies speculation that Tether sold any Bitcoin. He reaffirmed Tether's strategy of taking excess profits and parking them in hard assets: Bitcoin, gold, and land.   .    in a Sunday post on X, Ardoino flatly denied the speculation, stating the company 'didn't sell any Bitcoin'

articles.title: Miami-Dade Cryptocurrency Chair Supports $FUSD Appreciating Stable Token to possibly Address $400M Miami Debt Crisis
articles.author: Crypto Potato
articles.summary: Elijah John Bowdre of the Miami-Dade County Cryptocurrency Task Force publicly announced his support for the $FUSD token as a possible solution to the $400 million Miami debt crisis. He said that $F USD is a stable token that truly stands out.

articles.title: Nigerian Crypto Trader Accuses Former ADC Presidential Aspirant Chukwuka Monye Of Refusing To Refund Over $58,000 Mistakenly Transferred To Him
articles.summary: Jola Omotoso, a Nigerian cryptocurrency trader, has accused Chukwuka Monye of refusing to refund $58,500 that he transferred to him by mistake on July 11, 2025. Abbey & Aderoju Associates wrote a letter on August 8, 2025, demanding a formal refund of the funds wrongly transferred.

articles.title: Top 5 crypto leaders you should know about
articles.author: Bristi Dey
articles.summary: Lavish Choudhary is an Indian entrepreneur, investor and social media personality. He rose from modest beginnings in Muzaffarnagar, Uttar Pradesh. He launched the Trillioner Token (TLC), a cryptocurrency project and QFX Markets, a platform for forex and crypto trading.
